net.proteusframework.users.model

Class CredentialPolicyCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.users.model.CredentialPolicyCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Entity<Long>

    @I18NFile(symbolPrefix="users.CredentialPolicyCollection",
          i18n={@I18N(symbol="Low.Password Rules",l10n=@L10N(value="The password must have at least 4 characters.")),@I18N(symbol="Medium.Password Rules",l10n=@L10N(value="The password must have at least 7 characters, one letter, one number, and not based on a dictionary word.")),@I18N(symbol="High.Password Rules",l10n=@L10N(value="The password must have at least 7 characters, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and not based on a dictionary word."))})
@Entity
public class CredentialPolicyCollection
extends Object
implements Entity<Long>
    Collection of credential policies per level.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
